duties_responsibilities.duty: Develops low-to-moderately complex RIS applications and relational databases to include design, writing, installing, debugging, troubleshooting, documenting, and/or testing (full stack) based on user requirements and analysis using Spring Boot, Angular, Java, PL\SQL.
Sets up, configure, and maintains RIS servers.
Maintains familiarity with version control (Bitbucket) and containerization (Podman).
Prepares RIS system and program documentation for clients and technical staff.
Develops and executes of unit tests and functional tests for MAESTRO modules.
Maintains issues and issue lifecycle using JIRA.
Gives recommendations for the improvement of the code and application structure. Provides technical input for coding in accordance with established standards.
May play the role of Product Owner for low-to-moderately complex Maestro components, to ensure quality is met.
Participates in mentoring, training, and development of other employees.
Keeps current in professional growth. Keeps current on state/university rules and regulations with regards to technical responsibilities. Follows policies, procedures, and various standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of education and experience
